content: AMA The Fifth Person Investments Asked by Isaac ChanAsked on 19 Feb 2019Do your think a recession will occur in 2019?2 answersAnswerBump2

Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 20 Feb 2019Hi Issac,There is no way anyone can predict future event. Hence, instead on predicting the rain, as an investors we should be focusing on building the arks (watchlist of good companies) so that when the rain do come you are prepared to buy those great companies that you have research already.0 comments0
